transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Namaste madam, main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Aapka call aaya tha madam.

Customer: Hanji hanji sir maine call kiya tha.

Customer: Ye aapka Amir karke hai, A.K. Tensile structure, iska na jo IndiaMART ka isme requirement ka kya hai sir isme requirement vagera nahi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Requirement vagera nahi aa rahi hai?

Customer: Nahi nahi aur ek cheez aur ye inhone konsa package vagera le rakha hai kya hai wo mujhe janna tha.

Executive: Aap madam IndiaMART use karte hain aap inke koi baat phone par baat kar rahe hain?

Customer: Main inki company se sales team se baat kar rahi hun.

Executive: Sales team se baat kar rahi hain? Hanji hanji main handle kar rahi hun.

Executive: Achcha aapki baat hui nahi pehle na fir main aise hi main confirm kar raha tha Amir ji se baat ho paati hai?

Customer: Amir se nahi hai.

Executive: Ji?

Customer: Kya keh rahe ho?

Executive: Ha kuch nahi main confirm kar raha tha bas main keh raha hun base service chal rahi hai inki A.K. Tensile structure pe hamara jo sabse base package hota hai usko hum MDC bolte hain wo chal rahi hai theek hai.

Executive: Is package mein 17 leads weekly hum aapko provide karte hain weekly matlab jo bhi per day available rehti hai hamare portal par aap 17 by lead hafte ki yahan se le sakte ho.

Customer: To matlab hum per day 17 call wahan se aa rahi hai.

Executive: Per day nahi hai, per day nahi weekly madam.

Customer: Weekly?

Executive: Weekly 17 by leads. By leads ka matlab requirements hoti hai customer ki kisi ko bhi koi requirement hogi canopy ki ya fabrication service jo jis services mein aap deal karte ho theek hai to wo aake apni requirement post karte hain aap unpe connect karte ho to ye cheez aap use kar rahe ho inki taraf se to aap hi kya kehte hain use handle matlab ye sab cheeze aap hi dekh rahe ho kya by leads vagera?

Customer: Hanji main dekh rahi hun.

Executive: Aap hi dekh rahe ho? Haan.

Executive: Fir to ye sir idea vagera hai wo ji Karnataka udhar ke side ka aa raha hai.

Customer: Jo aap keh rahe ho 17 leads jo hai hum call kar sakte hain but hamare pe requirements aani chahiye na jo hum.

Customer: Tensile ka jo hai inka aa raha hai lekin tensile ke liye jo hai wo tensile nahi aa raha wo unka alag hi aa raha hai jaise ki koi steel pe rehta hai na.

Executive: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Wo uske liye unka unse kya.

Customer: Nahi aa raha tensile ke liye.

Executive: Achcha sir tensile ke liye tensile ke liye nahi aa rahi hai?

Customer: Nahi nahi tensile ke nahi jaise ki hamara jo kaam hai wo tensile ka hai aapka pakora type vagera ho gaya car parking ho gayi ye aapki jaise ki German hanger vagera ho gaye iski hai. Usme maine abhi tak dekha ek bhi aise nahi hai jo ki close hone wale hai haan.

Executive: Canopy vagera mein jo leads aa rahi hai haan madam canopy vagera mein jo leads aa rahi hai wo?

Customer: Haan wo bilkul Chinese fabric aa rahi hai wo to usme nahi hota usme hum kaam hi nahi kare.

Executive: Canopy mein aap kaam nahi kar rahe ho?

Customer: Nahi nahi canopy mein hum kaam karte hain Chinese fabric mein nahi karte na hamara jo hai SR fabric vagera mein hum kaam karte hain jo wo maang rahe hain Chinese fabric wo alag hoti hai jaise ki aapne thele vagera pe dekha wo umbrella vagera lagate hain.

Customer: To wo maangte hain wo log kyunki maine isme do teen client handle bhi kiye to unka wo hota hai request sale nahi karte.

Executive: Ye bataiye abhi ye is mail ka access hai aapke paas A.K. Tensile@gmail.com?

Customer: Mail ka mere paas access mail ka? Mail ka mere paas IndiaMART ka hai IndiaMART ka hai IndiaMART ka hai access mere pe.

Executive: Aapke paas? Hanji.

Executive: Konsa IndiaMART ka?

Customer: Unka jo IndiaMART ka jo aapka jo wo hai pages vagera hai wo sare open mein kar ke isme change kar sakte ho maine abhi jo hai do teen din hue hain usse I think abhi hua hoga maine isme pakora tents vagera kar dala but usme bhi koi requirement vagera nahi aaya.

Executive: Main keh raha tha na aap na ek kaam kariye paanch minute ke liye na Google meet join kar lijiye kyunki na aawaz bahut clear aa raha hai aawaz mein aur data aap mujhe whatsapp call kar lijiye ek kaam kijiye.

Executive: Whatsapp call allow nahi rehta hai jo kyunki main aap se baat kar raha hun abhi ye sari cheeze recording pe ja rahi hai to is vajah se humne wahi matlab ya to main phone kar sakta hun ya google meet kar sakta hun aap se.

Customer: Actually mere phone mein hai IndiaMART jo mere phone mein mere laptop mein nahi hai.

Executive: Haan to usse kuch issue nahi hai IndiaMART ka app hai na kafi hai wo.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: To main na aapko main agar aapke paas ye mail ka access hai A.K. Tensile@gmail.com theek hai to isse join kar lijiye otherwise aap mujhe mail de dijiye main aapko whatsapp message kar deta hun theek hai ek baar apna number bataiye.

Customer: 96.

Executive: 96 25.

Customer: 38 20 50.

Executive: Aap mujhe google uske meet ke liye keh rahe ho na to aap mujhe whatsapp pe link send kar do.

Executive: Theek hai main whatsapp pe kar deta hun aur aap ya to same mail se jo mail hai waise jo mail bol raha hun wo aapke paas hai dekho main aapko wo bhi kar deta hun mail mere pe hai nahi actually isiliye.

Executive: To aap aap aapke paas konsa mail hai wo mail aap mujhe whatsapp pe de dijiye main aapko message kar deta hun. Aap whatsapp mail pe bhi to aap link send karoge na?

Executive: Haan mail pe link send karunga otherwise aap kisi dusre mail se join kar rahe ho to wo mail de dijiye mujhe aap usse join kar lijiye mujhe bas mail yahan par update karna padega ki aapne kis vajah se join kara tha.

Customer: Aapke paas jo mail hai usi pe bhejo main mangwa leti hun link.

Executive: Uspe maine bhej diya hai aur wo mail hai aapke paas? Main link mangwa leti hun main main forward karwa leti hun main fir join kar leti hun. Link nahi link to main bhi aapko de dunga.

Customer: Theek hai main apna mail bhejti hun aap mujhe ek baar hi kar dijiye whatsapp pe.

Executive: Main aapko whatsapp par hi kar raha hun. Okay theek hai.

Executive: Okay ek minute dijiye mujhe main kar raha hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- No requirements are coming through IndiaMART.

- Wants to know the current subscription package.

- Leads are not relevant to their business.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the weekly lead system.

- Executive offered to send a Google Meet link.

- Executive asked for an email to send the link.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, google meet, whatsapp
